title: Interpretation of seeing cut banknotes according to the interpretation of Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Shaheen

preview.html: Interpretation of paper money According to the interpretation of Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Shaheen, many people aspire to find money to meet their needs, and many of them think about how to secure money for their future and the future of their children. Money is one of the basics that guarantees a person a decent life, and seeing money for many is a promising vision that makes them feel that their financial crises will soon be solved and they will get money, so in this article today we will learn together the interpretation of seeing cut banknotes according to the interpretation of Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Shaheen. Interpretation of the dream of seeing paper currencies is indicated. Ibn Sirin indicated that seeing torn money in a dream is an unfavorable vision that indicates the loss of money. Seeing money that has been stolen also indicates problems that the dreamer faces with the family. One of the undesirable symbols of this vision is that it indicates that the dreamer will face a major crisis in his life. If the money is torn and lost, this reflects the extent to which the dreamer feels remorse for his actions in reality. Interpretation of a dream about seeing banknotes in a dream. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing paper money in a dream as a sign of difficulties facing the dreamer. Seeing money in a dream means success, progress in business, and profit. Seeing banknotes in a dream and holding them indicates the dreamer’s efforts to earn money. Seeing paper money symbolizes the goals that the dreamer is trying to achieve. If the dreamer sees that money entered his mouth, this indicates disobedience, disobedience, and corruption of morals. Interpretation of the dream of seeing money in a dream, Al-Nabulsi’s Interpretation, Al-Nabulsi explained Seeing banknotes in a dream indicates the arrival of kindness to the dreamer and his meeting with someone he has not seen for a long time. In the case of dreaming of colored paper money, it indicates committing sins and disobedience. If the dreamer sees that he is carrying money and feels proud of it, this indicates that he has committed a lot of sins. Sins. If you dream that you are paying a lot of money, it means that you will face a financial loss. If the dreamer receives money in a dream, this indicates that he will face problems in his life. When you see that you have found a lot of money, it means that an abundance of livelihood The good and the abundant have arrived for them. Interpretation of the dream of Imam Al-Sadiq who sees paper money in a dream. If the dreamer sees red banknotes in a dream, this means that the desires that the dreamer wants to fulfill will come true. If the dreamer sees that he is receiving paper money, this indicates that he will receive happy news. In the event that you see the loss of banknotes in a dream, this means that the dreamer is facing problems in his life. If the dreamer sees that he is burning money in a dream, this indicates that the dreamer is going through a difficult period in reality. Interpretation of a dream about seeing red banknotes in a dreamWhen you dream of paper money, this It indicates the dreamer’s good condition and his commitment to obedience to God. One of the praiseworthy symbols of this vision is that it symbolizes the end of worries and the alleviation of distress. Seeing red money in a dream symbolizes the integrity of the dreamer’s instinct. Interpretation of a dream about finding banknotes in a dream

title: Interpretation of a dream about a passport in a dream Al-Osaimi and interpretation of a dream about obtaining a visa

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of a passport in Al-Osaimi’s dream and the interpretation of the dream of a visa. The passport is the means through which movement is carried out between countries and states around the world, and it is necessary to know that each country has a specific passport with certain rules that have been established so that travel by legal means between countries must be used. In travel, here we put the interpretation of a dream about a passport in a dream about Al-Osaimi and the interpretation of a dream about a visa and its connotations. Interpretation of a dream about a passport in a dream about Al-Osaimi Passports are one of the important means used in travel and movement between different countries, and it is also necessary to know that each country issues its own passport, and here we can Placing a dream about a passport in Al-Osaimi’s dream: Seeing a passport in a dream for an unmarried girl means that there is a relationship between friends who have good morals and also have a good reputation. Also, seeing a passport in a dream means that the dreamer will overcome the various problems he is going through and many Various crises that can be an obstacle for any person and this person in particular. Seeing a passport in a dream is an indication of the dreamer’s ability to achieve all the plans and goals that he seeks and aspires to. See also: Interpretation of a dream about cooked meat for a married woman, a single woman, and a man A pregnant woman. Interpretation of a dream about a passport. Singles’ trips. One vision of a passport is considered one of the most important visions that has many repercussions. It is also necessary to know that it is possible to research and learn about interpretations through what scholars have mentioned and what translators have said about them. Vision Here we put the interpretation of a dream about a passport for single people: When a girl gets a passport, this means that there will be joy and happiness that will enter her heart. Also, seeing a passport in general in a dream means that he will gain well and achieve many successes, and when a girl sees a passport in her dream, it symbolizes marriage. In this vision, there is an important opportunity for work that she must undertake and keep in order to obtain abundant blessings through it. But if the vision is for a police officer to verify the validity of her green passport, then this indicates success and excellence at the academic and practical levels for the girl and that she will achieve An impressive success in its field. Interpretation of a dream about a passport and a visa. Seeing a passport and a visa in a dream is considered one of the most important visions and indicators discussed because it contains many different signs. It is also necessary to know that a visa in a dream generally indicates many things, namely: Seeing a passport and a visa indicates To the beginning of a new life and the fulfillment of the hopes that the person desires. Also, when the visa is for a distant country, it indicates the great success that the person will achieve. Seeing the visa and passport is a sign of good news, happiness and joy that you will receive, but when the passport and visa are for someone you know, this indicates news Sarah about a happy occasion or a new job. See also: Interpretation of dreams that I was caring for a child when I was alone in a dream

title: Interpretation of seeing a colored veil in a dream

preview.html: Dreaming about a veil. Many of us dream about dreams, then we start looking for the correct interpretation of the vision. Before interpretation, we need to know the details of the dream and the psychological and social state of the viewer. Seeing a white veil in a dream. A white veil in a dream. It indicates that you hear good news. It may indicate a lot of money from a halal source. As for a dream Buying a white veil is a sign of travel or marriage. A white veil mixed with golden patterns indicates an abundance of the dreamer’s goodness and inheritance. Dreaming of a black veil in a dream: Seeing someone suffering from injustice. The black veil is a sign of the removal of injustice from him and his feeling of psychological comfort after exhaustion. The black veil indicates safety and stability for those who suffer from fear. Perhaps it It indicates the pure intention of the Creator. Seeing the veil of a married woman in a dream. The veil in the dream of a married woman is a sign of her family. If a woman sees a black veil, this is evidence of her distinction and her enjoyment of piety and sincerity. It may indicate satisfaction and contentment. As for her who dreams of a veil in white or light, this is a sign of an event A happy event will happen to her that she has been waiting for for a long time, such as the appearance of pregnancy. If you see her buying a hijab, this is a sign of the coming of a financial transformation for her and her husband. Seeing a hijab in a dream for a pregnant woman. A hijab in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that the pregnancy period will pass safely and securely. It may indicate that she will give birth to a male child. Whoever sees herself wearing the hijab in a dream is a sign of easy childbirth, God willing. Anyone who dreams of buying a hijab during sleep is a sign of the approaching date of delivery. As for what she dreams of doing? Take off the hijab. In a dream, it is a sign that she will be exposed to a psychological crisis as a result of problems with Her husband, but it will end after a while. Add the dream that you would like to interpret, indicating the marital status, in a comment below the article, and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Interpretation of seeing a funeral in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: I like fans Subscribers Fans Interpretation of the funeral in a dream by Al-Nabulsi, the funeral usually has interpretations in a dream that dreamers usually fear or those who dream of this dream and suffer from a state of anxiety and tension or fear for themselves or their parents and are overcome by the feeling of losing one of their children, but the funeral in a dream can dream of other interpretations and more to see the funeral in a dream, here is the following article from the Shamlol website. To see the funeral in a dream is to have a funeral after the death of a person, and this is a path to the grave, where all family members, friends and acquaintances left him. Dreaming of funerals is a scary thing. Here are the most important interpretations of seeing a funeral in a dream: Interpretation of seeing a funeral in a dream for a woman If a married woman sees that she has died and is brought into a coffin, the interpretation of the dream is that she is corrupt in religion or corrupt and does not fear God Almighty. But if an unmarried woman sees that she is like that, he died and was carried in the coffin, the interpretation of the dream is that he will marry soon. As for if a pregnant woman sees that she has died and was buried, but the pregnant woman mentioned her with kind words in the interpretation of the dream that she will give birth safely and that her child is in good health. Burial in a man’s dream Whoever sees in his dream that he has died and there is no one to carry him in the interpretation of the dream that the sleeper may be exposed to imprisonment, for example, or loneliness in general. As for whoever dreams that he is praying in a funeral or walking there, the interpretation of the dream is that he will meet new people in his life, but they are of a high degree of kindness and religiosity. As for whoever sees in his dream that he is walking in a funeral who knows him and carries his coffin, the meaning of the dream is that the sleeper eats forbidden money, and often eats money from the dead in a dream. But if the sleeper sees that the funeral is held in the middle of the markets, for example, then The funeral in a dream here indicates that the market has many sellers who cheat on weight and balance. Interpretation of the meaning of seeing a funeral Whoever sees in his dream that there are many funerals in one place, the funeral here shows that the people of this place practice many taboos, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a funeral procession flying in the air This dream is considered one of the most common dreams among people. Funerals, whether in the air or hanging in the air, generally refer to someone who is ready to die, those who have great influence in the state. We have given you several interpretations of seeing funerals in a dream, which does not mean passing death, separation or death. From the journey.

Interpretation of the meaning of seeing a funeral: Whoever sees in his dream that there are many funerals in one place, then the funeral here shows that the people of this place practice many forbidden things, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a funeral procession flying in the air: This dream is considered one of the most common dreams among people. Funerals, whether in the air or suspended in the air, are generally referred to for someone who is willing to die, for those who have great influence in the state.

title: Interpretation of a dream about carrying a baby girl

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a girl and a girl being pregnant in a dream is good visions that indicate a lot of goodness in the life of the fortuneteller, an abundance of livelihood, and a prestigious job. It also shows news of good luck and good luck. There is a lot of visual work to interpret it well, because the little girl in the dream shows happiness and joy, as she is considered a source of great livelihood. Interpretation of a dream about transferring a girl to a married woman according to Ibn Sirin. A married woman’s vision of a newborn is a sign of the good relationship between her and her husband and how calm this relationship is with her husband. And when she sees A married woman has baby teeth and she is one year old on the upper side and the other side is below, this indicates that she will give birth to twins. Watching a married woman who has a little girl, and that girl was showing teeth in the upper part of the mouth. This indicates that she will give birth to boys, but if she finds The teeth are on the lower side, so she gives birth to females. The sight of a married girl expresses the calmness of the relationship and the stability of married life with her husband. Seeing children moving around in a dream in general at this stage, Ibn Sirin says that it portends a lot of goodness, a good life and happiness to whoever saw the vision. Seeing a woman carrying a girl Very beautiful and pretty little girl, and that little girl seems to be smiling. This expressed a lot of sustenance and goodness coming to this lady and those around her. If this woman is not pregnant and wants to get pregnant, then this vision is a sign that she will get pregnant in a very short time. Or that the good news It will follow in the near future. For a woman to see in her dream that she is carrying a little girl to play with, this indicates happy news that everyone is waiting for. When an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is carrying a little girl, this vision brings a lot of happy news to that girl. And that God will oblige her and compensate her for every painful moment. In her life. As for seeing a young girl crying in a dream, this vision expresses the death of one of her family members. But he has a lot of debts and is also likely to hear unpleasant news. See also: Interpretation of a dream of transporting a girl to a married woman. Interpretation of a dream of transporting a girl to a married woman by Imam Al-UsaimiWhen you see A pregnant woman dreams that she is carrying a little girl in her arms. This is also evidence that she sees the ease of childbirth, and expresses that she has given birth to a male child, and this vision also indicates joy and happiness. Seeing a child in a dream is also considered a praiseworthy dream, as it expresses good nutrition. And abundance for the dreamer. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a child in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about transferring a girl to a married woman from Nabulsi. Seeing someone wanting to carry a child in his arms, and the infant was taken by God. This is a sign that he will lose a lot from the owners. This dream is any person who finds herself carrying a child in her arms. She is a baby and playing with her. It expresses the death of worry and sadness for the insight. And he will have a lot of good news in the near future. Seeing the vision and the child was playing and laughing. This vision expresses a lot of goodness, blessing, goodness, happiness, and paying off debts. See also

title: Man cut off in a dream

preview.html: Cutting a leg in a dream. The leg is considered one of the most important organs, as it is used to carry the rest of the body’s organs, as well as the most important means of walking and movement. Therefore, cutting a man represents great distress to its owner, and a disability that causes many problems. It should be noted that seeing a man being cut in a dream can raise many questions for the dreamer, but like other visions, it carries many connotations that stem from the nature of the dream and the dreamer, and this What we will explain in the article below, so stay with us. Interpretation of a dream about cutting off a leg in a dream: If you see someone in a dream, cut off a leg. This is an indication of the destruction that may befall the dreamer in his life, and this loss indicates loss of money or people. If a person sees If someone is engaged in trading in a dream, then a man will be cut off. This is a sign that he is losing his money and standing among the traders and hence he needs to think properly before making any decision to avoid these losses. When someone sees in a dream that he is cutting off his leg. This is evidence that he made a mistake. A grave mistake, and it may result in a huge loss for him due to his lack of good conduct, and God knows best. When a married woman sees in her dream, the man is cut off. This may prove that he is not qualified to deal with the difficulties he is going through. It also shows the extent of the misery she is living with her husband, but God will remove these problems. God willing. When an unmarried woman sees in her sleep, cut off her leg. This may indicate that she is forced to accept a husband who may not be suitable for her. With the intention of escaping from the hell of psychological problems she suffers from in the family home, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about cutting off a leg with a son Sirin Ibn Sirin tells that when he sees a person in a dream he cuts a person. This is an indication of the loss of money or the loss of someone close to the fortune teller, and God knows best. Ibn Sirin explains that when he sees a person in a dream he cuts off one leg. This may be a sign that he has lost half of the money, not all of it. The vision also carries an indication of divorce and estrangement from the family, and God knows best. When a person dreams of seeing a man being cut off and feels sorry for that. This may be an indication that some misfortunes may befall the fortuneteller in the near future. Ibn Sirin explains that when you see a person in a dream, his leg Cut off. This may be an indication that the dreamer has lost his father, which increases the dreamer’s grief for him, and God knows best. Ibn Sirin tells that when a person dreams that the man’s arteries have been mutilated, this may indicate that he is unsuccessful in the projects he has undertaken, because it indicates His ability to leave his job, and God knows best. We chose for you: Interpretation of dreams about falling to the ground. Interpretation of a dream about cutting a man in a dream about a single girl. If he sees a sleeping woman, cut her legs. This is a sign that she will be blessed with a man, but he is not good, and therefore it is necessary to think carefully or stay away from him. When a single woman dreams that someone is cutting off her legs. This may indicate the release of someone dear to her in reality. When an unmarried woman sees in her dream that her husband has been cut off. This may indicate that he will face financial problems in the coming days. But he will overcome them if he wishes. May God make some good decisions
preview.text: Cutting a leg in a dream. The leg is considered one of the most important organs, as it is used to carry the rest of the body’s organs, as well as the most important means of walking and movement. Therefore, cutting a man represents great distress to its owner, and a disability that causes many problems. It should be noted that seeing a man being cut in a dream can raise many questions for the dreamer, but like other visions, it carries many connotations that stem from the nature of the dream and the dreamer, and this What we will explain in the article below, so stay with us. Interpretation of a dream about cutting off a leg in a dream: If you see someone in a dream, cut off a leg. This is an indication of the destruction that may befall the dreamer in his life, and this loss indicates loss of money or people. If a person sees If someone is engaged in trading in a dream, then a man will be cut off. This is a sign that he is losing his money and standing among the traders and hence he needs to think properly before making any decision to avoid these losses. When someone sees in a dream that he is cutting off his leg. This is evidence that he made a mistake. A grave mistake, and it may result in a huge loss for him due to his lack of good conduct, and God knows best. When a married woman sees in her dream, the man is cut off. This may prove that he is not qualified to deal with the difficulties he is going through. It also shows the extent of the misery she is living with her husband, but God will remove these problems. God willing. When an unmarried woman sees in her sleep, cut off her leg. This may indicate that she is forced to accept a husband who may not be suitable for her. With the intention of escaping from the hell of psychological problems she suffers from in the family home, and God knows best. title: Interpretation of seeing salt in a dream by Ibn Sirin in detail

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing salt in a dream by Ibn Sirin, because salt is abundant in our lives and is included in many foods and recipes that can only be made by adding salt to them. Interpretation of salt in a dream through Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing salt in a dream. Interpretation of a bag of salt in a dream for a single woman. It is known that salt is present in our lives and is constantly used, and therefore it is included in the preparation and cooking of many, many foods, so it is considered the basic substance in food, in addition It gives the food a delicious and wonderful taste. It has a delicious and delicious taste, and salt has many and varied uses that go beyond food. It can be used as a type of sterilization and disinfection material for various living organisms, in addition to being used to preserve food and protect it from spoilage and rot. In this regard, seeing salt in food certainly has associations and indicates the occurrence Events and changes in the dreamer’s life. Interpretation of seeing a spray of salt in a dream for a single woman. Salt has many meanings for a single girl in the field of dream interpretation, many of which confirm and prove that seeing salt is a good and happy vision, as salt is often used in preparing and cooking food. Above all, The vision of salt for an unmarried girl indicates the approach of her relationship and marriage, as well as an indication of the nearness of stability and happiness. Imam Ibn Uthaymeen believes that the unmarried girl’s taste for salt is evidence of the hardships and difficulties of the days that this girl will face. The vision also indicates in some cases her marriage to a well-to-do young man. Money, status, and vice versa, as there is another indicator that indicates her marriage to a stingy young man. If a girl sees herself eating salt, this means that stability will come and marriage will happen to her. A strange girl giving a bag of salt to a girl is an indication of the problems that she will face from friends and relatives. Narrated by the world. Ibn Sirin said that he saw a girl in her dream sprinkling salt in a clear indication of her relationship with a religious and righteous husband. Interpretation of seeing salt in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a table in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of salt in the ground for a wife. To see salt, there are many interpretations and hints for a married woman, whether on the level Marital relationship or at the level of pregnancy and childbirth. These interpretations are as follows: Seeing salt in a married woman’s dream indicates the presence of good news and happy events that she will receive in her life. Also, if a married woman sees salt in her dream, this is an indication of the abundance of money and abundance. Another interpretation To see a married woman for salt is an imminent pregnancy. While the husband gives salt to his wife in a dream, it shows good feelings and emotions between them. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing pickles by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi The meaning of salt in a pregnant woman’s dream A pregnant woman thinks a lot during pregnancy, the reason for seeing many dreams And visions, including seeing salt, where seeing salt has many interpretations, such as: It is generally said that the sight of salt is beneficial for a pregnant woman. Where the vision of salt indicates

title: Interpretation of a dream about marrying a dead person in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of a dead person’s marriage contract in a dream is presented to you only on the encyclopedia website, as many people may see such strange visions in their dreams, and it is known that dreams of a dead person are among the real dreams that form a vision, because the dead exist in the world of reality. Therefore, dreams related to them cannot come from demons, but rather have some signs and connotations, and marrying a dead person in a dream is one of the visions that have many different meanings and interpretations, which we present to you in the following lines. Interpretation of a dream about marrying a dead person in a dream: There are many interpretations and indications. However, one sees a dead person concluding his marriage contract in a dream. In such visions, the dead person wants to tell the monarch a certain message or he is telling his family a certain message, and this vision is. Many scholars and dream interpretation scholars interpreted it as a good vision, and that it portends confusion and food, including Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and other dream interpretation scholars. First: Interpretation of the dead person’s marriage contract in a dream: If he sees the deceased in a dream and maintains his marriage, this vision appears. Good news for the dreamer, especially if the deceased in the dream was one of the people close to the dreamer’s heart, like the dead person in the dream. He wants to give good news to the dreamer that he lives in bliss in his grave and that he is blessed in the afterlife, and that he will not be tortured, and God knows best. Seeing a marriage contract in a dream for a dead person is a vision that shows that this dead person has many good deeds that will save him and that it has been predicted by heaven, God willing. And then also the dead person who comes to be married in the dream announces to the pioneer that she will marry bliss and heaven, and God knows best. Second: The dead father gets married in a dream: In the event that the deceased father really looks like he is holding his wedding in the dream, then this vision shows joy. The year and happiness for the family of the deceased and his children, and this could also be news of the marriage of someone in reality to the children of that deceased father, and it is a harbinger of marriage for his sons or daughters in reality if the fortuneteller or one of his sons is not married. In the event that we see the deceased father in the dream as making the marriage Concluding a marriage contract in a dream, then this vision is evidence of complete satisfaction with the son on the part of the deceased father before his death, and this is evidence of the father’s bliss in the grave, and God knows best. In the event that you see a dead father as if he was tying the knot in a dream, this vision shows that the dreamer, who is his son, gives Lots of charity for his father and he always prays for his father and also reminds him of that. His prayer reaches his father and his father wants to tell him that he saved him from the torment of the grave. Third: The dead person gets married in a dream and he is happy: But if one sees the dead person in the dream, and his marriage takes place, and the deceased person in the dream is satisfied with this Qur’an, then this vision shows the good that will happen to the people of this The dead, which is evidence of happiness and contentment and that his family will receive goodness, joy and happiness in the coming period. Seeing a dead man contracting his marriage in a dream, and the dead person being happy and laughing in the dream, this vision shows the happiness that the deceased experiences, and that he is among the blessed in their graves.

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a lion in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Nabulsi

preview.html: Dreaming of seeing a lion in a dream, and seeing a lion in a dream indicates illness and death, and killing a lion is a sign of defeating the enemy and healing from diseases, and eating lion meat means money and plunder. Interpretation of dreams: To see a lion in a dream is signs of good and evil, and to see a lion, it is certain that this vision resembles the signs, concepts, and elements in our lives that we face clearly through interpretation and vision. Eating lion meat in a dream is evidence of money and prosperity from the Sultan, and the dream interpretation of the appearance of a small lion in a dream A girl without fear is evidence that she will soon marry a good man.. Interpretation of a dream about a lion by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin explained that seeing a lion in a dream while sleeping with him means getting rid of illness. Interpretation of seeing lion meat in a dream indicates victory over the enemy. Seeing a lion in A dream, but this lion did not see it as evidence of his escaping from misfortunes. Therefore, seeing the dreamer eating a lion’s head in a dream means that he will obtain abundant money. Seeing a lion in a dream, attacking it and not being able to kill it is evidence of his serious illness. A dream about riding a lion that feels fear is A sign of disaster. Dreaming of seeing a lion in a dream. The dreamer who sees that he is marrying a lion in a dream indicates the elimination of misfortunes and obstacles. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a lion from Nabulsi. Seeing a lion in a dream is a symbol of an unjust ruler. Seeing a lion in a dream symbolizes death in reality. The patient who Seeing a lion in a dream is a sign of recovery from this disease. Therefore, the dreamer who sees a lion in his dream indicates ignorance and an unjust enemy. Dreaming of seeing a lion in a dream To see a lion killed in a dream means victory over the enemy. Dreaming of marrying a lion in a dream is evidence of... The dreamer’s rise and escape from dangers. Seeing him eating lion meat in a dream is evidence of money and prosperity from the Sultan. Interpretation of a dream about a lion for a single woman. If one sees a lion in his dream, this means an unjust enemy. A dream about seeing a lion in a dream is evidence of seeing an unmarried woman bringing a lion in a dream It indicates stress and sadness for her. The dream of unmarried women who see themselves eating lion meat is a sign that they will get everything they want in life. Seeing a pet lion in a girl’s dream means that she has gotten rid of the problems she faces in her life. The interpretation of the dream is the appearance of A lion in a fearless girl’s dream is evidence that she will soon marry a good person. Interpretation of a dream about a married lion: A dream about seeing a lion in a dream, but seeing a lion in a married woman’s dream indicates a malicious and envious enemy. Seeing a married woman defeating a lion in a dream means that she has the ability to Earn money and earn a living. Interpretation of a dream about a lion in the home for a married woman is evidence of people seeking to destroy her family and her married life. Seeing the killing of a lion in a married woman’s dream is evidence of the abundance of money, her husband’s livelihood, and the success of her children in all the affairs of their lives. Interpretation of a dream about a lion for a woman A pregnant woman dreams of seeing a lion in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a lion in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of problems in childbirth and she may fall ill. Seeing a lion in a dream for a woman
